function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of non-COVID-19 perturbations on conservation outcomes","Impact":"Increased risk of biodiversity loss and habitat degradation","Mitigation":"Implementing conservation strategies and protecting habitats","Technologies":"Remote sensing, habitat mapping, conservation planning tools","People":"Conservation organizations, environmental agencies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Complex conservation outcomes of non-COVID-19 perturbations","Impact":"Uncertainty in predicting and addressing conservation challenges","Mitigation":"Enhancing monitoring and data collection, adaptive management strategies","Technologies":"Remote sensing, data analysis tools, predictive modeling","People":"Conservation researchers, environmental agencies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Habitat degradation and fragmentation","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity, disruption of ecological balance","Mitigation":"Restoration of habitats, reforestation, ecological connectivity measures","Technologies":"Habitat restoration techniques, GIS mapping, ecological modeling","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations","Owner":"Local communities, environmental agencies"}]}
